item.title: Creating a Private Package repository for Debian
item.description: Caveat A lot of this article was nicked from a brilliant Digital Ocean article. Go check out all their tutorials and while you’re there why not sign up! Why bother creating your own repository? So you want to host your own .deb packages to make is simple for users to install without the need for git or building from source? Read on… This guide goes through how to set up a Debian flavoured package repository.
